QuestData.Title: Ring of Trials: Captain Boomspark
QuestData.Description: You've been making a name for yourself in the arena, $n!$b$bDon't get too excited though...fame has its consequences! You've been challenged by an up-and-coming gladiator who is looking to make a name for himself, sound familiar?$b$bYour next fight is against Captain Boomspark, a mercenary who came here to fight for the Iron Horde.$b$bThe Iron Horde ain't exactly throwing piles of gold around, so now he's here!$b$bHe's got a shredder, so watch out for the blades... and the fire too... especially the fire!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Defeat Captain Boomspark and his weaponized shredder!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Captain Boomspark in the Ring of Trials.
QuestData.CompletionText: What are you doing standing around? Get in the arena and spill some blood!
QuestData.RewardText: I ain't ever seen anybody dismantle a shredder quite like that before!$b$bYou've made me a lot of money, $n! Only the best gladiators survive this long in the arena; and yet, even with that in mind, there's still something different about you...$b$bIt's your eyes...they look as if they've stared death in the face a thousand times and never even blinked.$b$bTake your cut of the profit and rest up, the biggest fight is still ahead!

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Guzrug to begin the fight
